com.microsoft.band.sensors

Interface BandAltimeterEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BandSensorEvent

    public interface BandAltimeterEvent
extends BandSensorEvent
    A sensor event with altimeter data (V2 Only)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getFlightsAscended()
      Method to get the number of floors ascended since the band was last factory reset
      long getFlightsAscendedToday()
      Method to get the number of floors ascended today
      long getFlightsDescended()
      Method to get the number of floors descended since the band was last factory reset

      Method to get the current rate of ascent/descent in cm/s

      Method to get the total elevation gained by taking steps since the band was last factory reset in cm

      Method to get the total elevation lost by taking steps since the band was last factory reset in cm

      Method to get the number of steps ascended since the band was last factory reset

      Method to get the number of steps descended since the band was last factory reset

      Method to get the total elevation gained since the band was last factory reset in cm

      Method to get the elevation ascended today in cm

      Method to get the total elevation lost since the band was last factory reset in cm
